body: Getting a single line in the console stating "Requested feature was omitted at compile time" does not help narrow down the problem. People [still run into this issue](https://jkhub.org/forums/topic/12447-cant-load-bsp-requested-feature-was-omitted-at-compile-time/). One known cause are progressive JPG images, which should also print the file name on error.
title: "Requested feature was omitted at compile time" / improved error handling
